original_text: Immediately after this, Jesus said to his disciples, ‘Get in the boat and sail across to the other side of the lake.’ Jesus said that he would first send the crowd away. Then he would also leave.
korean_text: 예수께서 즉시 제자들을 재촉하사 자기가 무리를 보내는 동안에 배를 타고 앞서 건너편으로 가게 하시고

sentences.original_text: and sail across to the other side of the lake.'
Jesus said that he would first send the crowd away.

sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그도 떠날 것이라고 하셨다.
